caseStudies.title: Optimization of Helicopter Production Line
caseStudies.challenge: A major European aerospace manufacturer needed to modernize their fleet of transport trolleys for their light helicopter assembly line. The old system was aging, not ergonomic, and couldn't keep up with increasing production rates. Production teams faced risks of MSDs (Musculoskeletal Disorders) during repeated handling.
caseStudies.solution: LLEDO AEROTOOLS developed a custom solution with specific adaptations: ergonomic hydraulic control system, reinforced skids for intensive use (3 cycles/day), quick-lock system to reduce preparation time, and anti-scratch coating to preserve helicopter skid conditions.
results: Significant reduction in aircraft movement time

testimonial.quote: LLEDO trolleys transformed our production line. Reliability and ergonomics are there. Our teams particularly appreciate the smooth handling.
testimonial.author: Jean-Marc D.

caseStudies.title: Rapid Deployment for Emergency Operations
caseStudies.challenge: A government air rescue base needed GSE equipment allowing ultra-fast deployment of intervention helicopters. In the context of emergency operations (fires, mountain rescue, airborne SAMU), every second counts. The old system required 3 operators and 5 minutes of preparation.
caseStudies.solution: LLEDO DEFENSE designed a special 'Rapid Deploy' transport trolley: instant start hydraulic system, wireless remote safety control, 72h battery autonomy without recharging, universal multi-type skids, and rapid transport kit for mobile detachments.
results: Operation possible with single qualified operator

testimonial.quote: In emergency operations, speed is vital. The LLEDO system saves us 3 to 4 minutes on each takeoff. That's huge for victims.
testimonial.author: Commander Pierre L.

caseStudies.title: Preventive Maintenance for Offshore Fleet
caseStudies.challenge: A major offshore helicopter operator sought to standardize maintenance equipment across their 3 French bases. The mixed fleet required versatile equipment, resistant to corrosion (marine environment), and compliant with petroleum standards (ATEX).
caseStudies.solution: LLEDO Industries provided a complete range: modular transport trolleys with interchangeable skids (3 sets per base), 2-5m telescopic access platforms certified offshore, 316L stainless steel maintenance tools (anti-corrosion), IP65 protected equipment transport trolleys, and 5-year preventive maintenance contract.
results: Proven reliability over several years of operation

testimonial.quote: The reliability of LLEDO equipment in offshore environments is exceptional. After 3 years, no signs of corrosion. Our fleet availability has significantly improved.
testimonial.author: Marc S.
